_source.text: [ 80 ] [ 81 ] Kevin Smith , who guest starred in the episode " Driver Ed ", said that Veronica Mars was "hands-down, the best show on television right now, and proof that TV can be far better than cinema."

text: [ 80 ] [ 81 ] **Kevin** **Smith** , who guest starred in the episode " Driver Ed ", said that Veronica Mars was "hands-down, the best **show** on television right now, and proof that TV can be far **better** **than** cinema."
